metadata.title: ATG by Wrangler Men's Reinforced Utility Shorts
features: REGULAR FIT. These men's shorts are designed with a regular ft through the seat and thigh for a comfortable fit. Great for camping, hiking or biking, these shorts have a gusseted crotch for extra mobility. Inseam: 10-inch.
QUICK DRYING. Great for wicking away moisture, these quick-drying utility shorts help keep you dry through any activity, rain or shine.

STRETCH COMFORT. No matter what your day has in store, move with confidence in these versatile stretch canvas shorts. These cotton blend shorts have just enough spandex to allow flexible movement while retaining their shape, wear after wear.

ADDED PROTECTION. The perfect shorts for a camping trip with family or hiking with friends, you can rest assured you'll stay well protected from the sun with UPF 30 protection. Designed with a glasses cleaner in the hem, this shirt will keep you prepared, regardless of the task.

SECURE STORAGE. Back patch hip pockets, front slash pockets, a side zip pocket and a front watch pocket help keep your valuables safely stowed away. A glasses cleaner in the hem keeps you prepared, regardless of the task.
description: ALL TERRAIN GEAR: You’re ready to take on your next great adventure, which is why ATG x Wrangler brings you performance outdoor apparel that’s got you covered. Nature doesn’t hold back, which is why we’ve designed a full collection of tops, pants, shorts, outerwear and more with stretch, moisture-wicking fabric that helps block the sun with UPF protection and keep you dry for comfort that doesn’t quit. The line is packed with innovative outdoor tech features like sunglasses cleaner at the hem of all shirts, durable, reinforced pants with reinforced and lightweight, breathable fabrics. Whether you’re camping at your favorite site, hiking a new trail or even just exploring your own backyard, we’ve got the gear you need. Any destination. Any terrain. Anytime.

title: ATG by Wrangler Men's Reinforced Utility Shorts
